alert.note: Alert for Misty Fjords (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 8:47AM AKST until February 05 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches. Chance of freezing rain. * WHERE...Misty Fjords including Hyder. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will continue to be high through Friday morning. Around 15.8 inches has already fallen at Hyder as of 3 am. A potential for freezing rain to mix in before the transition away from snow. A transition to rain is possible sometime Friday afternoon or evening. However confidence remains low on the timing of the change over. An earlier or later transition time may greatly effect snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
